means: 用来表示某人或某物即主语本身，用来表示某人或某物属于某一群体或有某种性质（ be的过去分词 ）

sentence.Network_en: The house seemed muted, hushed as if it had been deserted.
sentence.Network_cn: 房子里似乎悄然无声，安静得好像已经没人在住一样。

sentence.Network_en: It had once been the home of a wealthy nobleman.
sentence.Network_cn: 这里曾是一个有钱贵族的宅邸。

sentence.Network_en: These files have been zipped up to take up less disk space.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些文档已经进行了压缩，以节省磁盘空间。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Troops tried to enter the building which had been captured and wired with explosive charges ., 军队试图进入这座已经被占领并绑满炸药的建筑.
自己总结不定词--过去式--过去分词 - 豆丁网 ... ] is 的过去式 been 是，有 bear 承受，忍受，熊.
Close contacts have been placed under medical observation and all remain well ., 对于和他有过密切接触的人现在置于医学观察之下 , 现在都很健康.
You also been dealing with shifting sands , changing goalposts and erratic attitudes ., 你也一直在应付变化 , 改变规则和修正态度.

list.abs: be动词的动词形式_百度知道 ... 现在完成时 have been，has been 过去完成时 had been 如果是一般过去时,就用 was/were.
you see ive always been a fighter ., 你认为我一直是个斗士.
chips may have been fried in animal fat ., 月芯片已经炸动物脂肪.
" our all have been ready , we were anticipating the astronaut wins the return ! " Eerdui said., " 我们已一切准备就绪 , 我们期待着航天员胜利归来 ! " 额尔敦说.
世界化妆品品牌大全 - 豆丁网 ... 婕若琳( Galenic) 哲非班利( GEOFFREY BEENE) 魅影( GHOST).

encyclopedia.content: been英音：[bi:n]美音：[bɪn] been be的过去分词，是 has been 用于完成时，表示“已经” eg. Scientists think that there has been life on Earth for millions of years 科学家认为生命存在于地球已经有几百万年了。 have been done现在完成时的被动形式，表示已经被完成 have been doing现在完成进行时，表示到现在为止仍然在进行。 The work has been done.工作已经被完成了。强调结果 They have been playing foot

entry.def: Been is the past participle of be .
If you have been to a place, you have gone to it or visited it.

example.ex: He's  already been to Tunisia, and is to go on to Morocco and Mauritania...
example.tran: 他已经去过突尼斯了，还要去摩洛哥和毛里塔尼亚。

auth_sentence.content: I have been speaking to my friend in Portugal.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have been speaking to my friend in Portugal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have been speaking to my friend in Portugal.

auth_sentence.content: There's been a big age and experience gap.
auth_sentence.res_content: There's been a big age and experience gap.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's been a big age and experience gap.

auth_sentence.content: This has been a really remarkable period of time.
auth_sentence.res_content: This has been a really remarkable period of time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This has been a really remarkable period of time.

means.word_mean: 去过了；经历过了；没有新意

sentences.en: Not camping again! Been there, done that, got the T-shirt.
sentences.cn: 不要再提野营了！去过了，还得了一件T恤衫，再去就没劲了。

sentences.en: She’s been around a bit so she’ll know how to deal with this type of problem.
sentences.cn: 她经验老到，知道如何应对这类问题。

sentences.en: He’d had a lot of girlfriends before he met Sue.He’d certainly been around a bit.
sentences.cn: 在遇到苏之前他有过好多女友，当然是情场老手了。

sentences.en: I know how bad it is when your parents get divorced—I’ve been there before, remember?
sentences.cn: 我知道你的父母离婚后情况有多糟糕—别忘了，我也有过同样的经历。
